1.0.name: wordpress/designer-pages-collection-widget
1.0.description:
Note: This plugin requires cURL or the ability to fetch remote files by their URL.

The Designer Pages widget allows you to easily integrate your favorite collection from http://www.designerpages.com into your WordPress site. The process is simple, and the widget is tweakable in many ways. You can change

  • Header Font Color
  • Header Background Color
  • Font Color
  • Background Color
  • Border Color
  • Collection to fetch from
  • Font Family
  • Width
  • Number of Products
  • No Style at all (so you can customize the CSS yourself onsite).

If you choose no style, then the widget will be sent your site just as pure HTML, so you should expect to style it yourself. It's basic structure is:

There should be more then enough DOM hooks for your CSS to totally customize
